formattedAddress: 2 Prince St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2 Prince St, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text: Noah initially helped me and picked out a selection of sunglasses he thought I might like. I ended up with two. Have been wanting a pair of Jacques Marie Mage sunglasses and I’m in love with them. Saved myself a flight to LA. I was not disappointed. We went back to exchange and Kate was very helpful in trying to get a bigger size appreciate her. They didn’t have a bigger size but she said she was gonna see what they could do

originalText.text:
I have been buying glasses for over decade and the store in SoHo exceeded my expectations and experience was amazing!  Tianna always provided a service I can’t say I have experience in other optical / glasses store. She was detail, patience and always ensure all measurements are done correctly and the customer service is nothing but breathtaking.

Kate and Joanna are also wonderful and always provided additional feedback when it comes to choosing the frames. After my first experience I have come back for 4 additional pairs and referred my family to this store location!

Thank you!

originalText.text: The best shopping experience for glasses ever! Kate made me feel like royalty and helped me find my favorite frames. There were so many amazing styles and she patiently assessed every one with me until we found the perfect pair. Joanna offered great assistance as well. The environment was welcoming and friendly (great tunes, too!) and I can’t wait to come back for another visit!

text.text: The best shopping experience for glasses ever! Kate made me feel like royalty and helped me find my favorite frames. There were so many amazing styles and she patiently assessed every one with me until we found the perfect pair. Joanna offered great assistance as well. The environment was welcoming and friendly (great tunes, too!) and I can’t wait to come back for another visit!

originalText.text:
Best frames ever. Great place- excellent service. Each frame is a master piece made in France. To my surprise, i learned that there are other countries that manufacture thing in this world other than China.
I am pretty sure that I will be offered a role in a movie if any Hollywood director saw me wearing them strolling the streets of soho.  But to their disappointment i live in Peoria, Illinois- plus I have a carrier.
Regarding staff: I was helped by Kate- She is great,  I was exhausted and tired but Kate made sure I choose the correct ones and she gave me her professional advice regarding fit and size.

originalText.text:
The best experience I ever had in an eyewear store. I have worn glasses for more than ten years and tried many brands and stores in major cities worldwide.
It's a fantastic brand with super stylish glasses
More importantly, some stylists walk you through a tremendous experience in picking a pair of glasses.
The combination of the great design and walkthrough gives you a new concept of glasses.
Joanna was amazing!
